snippet.title: Village Meow - Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
🐾✨ Welcome to Village Meow! ✨🐾

Step into the cozy, magical world of Village Meow, where you'll explore a hidden society of cats, take on exciting quests, and meet unforgettable feline friends! In this demo trailer, get a sneak peek of the game’s charming visuals, heartwarming story, and the whimsical adventure that awaits.

In Village Meow, you’ll play as Kiti, a curious city cat who finds herself in a village ruled by the mischievous Bos Oyen. Will you pay off your debt or rally the cats to overthrow the tyrant? The choice is yours!

🎮 What to expect in the demo:
- Explore the beautiful, hand-crafted world of Village Meow
- Meet and interact with a variety of unique cat characters
- Complete quests and uncover the secrets of the village
- Relaxing, story-driven gameplay with adorable, cozy aesthetics

📅 Stay tuned for the demo release today and don’t miss out on any updates!

Follow us on Instagram for exclusive content, behind-the-scenes updates, and more:
👉 @village.meow 🐱💖
